summary: Comic mayhem ensues when two lovely blondes, Dee and Dawn, are mistaken as international mob killers.
cast: Pamela Anderson|Denise Richards|Emmanuelle Vaugier|Meghan Ory|Joey Aresco|Garry Chalk|Jay Brazeau|Woody Jeffreys|Kevin P. Farley|John Farley|Byron Mann|Patrick P. Pon|Phoenix Ly|Douglas Newell|Alex Bruhanski|Anna Williams|Malcolm Scott|John Tench|Kyle Labine|Alistair Abell|Nathalie Fay|Peter Benson|Alfonso Quijada|Dean McKenzie|Reg Tupper|Kevin Blatch|Tosha Doiron|Julia Benson|Ted Friend|Brock Johnson|Teach Grant|Drew McCreadie|Dean Hamilton|Michael Roberds|Howard Blank|Sandra-Jessica Couturier|Keith Lewis|Ayesha Shiva|Jerry Wasserman
title: Dos rubias muy rubias
